trans-unit.source: Represents a fault that can have an associated HTTP status code.

When using a WCF REST endpoint (<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>) the HTTP status code on the response is set accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WCF REST 端點 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 及 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>) 時，會隨之設定回應上的 HTTP 狀態碼。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException> can be used with non-REST endpoints and behaves like a regular <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>.
trans-unit.target: 然而，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException> 可搭配非 REST 端點使用，而且行為表現就如同一般的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>。

trans-unit.source: When using a WCF REST endpoint, the response format of the serialized fault is determined in the same way as a non-fault response.
trans-unit.target: 使用 WCF REST 端點時，已序列化錯誤的回應格式與非錯誤回應會以同樣的方式決定。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] WCF REST formatting, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] WCF REST 格式化，請參閱[WCF Web HTTP 格式化](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/wcf-web-http-formatting.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException" /> class.
The HTTP status code to return to the caller.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpStatusCode" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebFaultException" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
The serialization information to which the object data is added when serialized.
The destination for the serialized object.

An implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> method that is called when an object is serialized to a stream.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.HttpStatusCode" /> associated with the fault.
The HTTP status code associated with the fault.
trans-unit.target: 與錯誤相關聯的 HTTP 狀態碼。
